A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a lifelong lover of the  Star Wars Universe and with the story of the Jedi.  This movie did not honor any of the original films (IV-VI) except in a passing way. This film is simply  pandering to nostalgia and selling plush toys for Disney.  I am not looking forward to episode IX.  You win Lucas\, Dinsney et al.  You have killed my childhood.
